xrefdescription.para: Restructured API to make naming more readable and consistent. Function was deprecated in Tripal 2.0 and will be removed 2 releases from now. This function has been replaced by tripal_get_multiple_stocks().
Restructured API to make naming more readable and consistent. Function was deprecated in Tripal 2.0 and will be removed 2 releases from now. This function has been replaced by tripal_get_stock().

detaileddescription.para: Return all stocks with a given name identifier which might match stock.name, stock.uniquename, dbxref.accession, stockprop.value where stockprop.type='synonym'

parameterdescription.para: The name identfier to be used
The stock.organism_id of the stock to be selected

simplesect.para: An array of stock node objects
